about.title: About The Artist
about.heading: HI! I'M SANDU
about.paragraph1: I'm a tattoo artist with 4 years of experience and a huge love for tattooing.
about.paragraph2: I specialize in linework, ornamental designs, and black & red tones. But I'm a flexible artist, so don't worry, we'll make something stylish that suits you.

q1.question: Does it hurt to get a tattoo?
q1.answer: It depends on the placement! But I work gently and always take breaks. Many clients say it was much easier than they expected. Don't worry, I also have numbing cream if needed.

q2.question: How much does a tattoo cost?
q2.answer: Prices start from 2,000 CZK and depend on the size and complexity. Message me with your idea and I'll calculate the price for free!

q3.question: How do I take care of it after the session?
q3.answer: I'll give you detailed aftercare instructions and stay in touch. In short: after the session I apply a healing film for free, you'll need to remove it after 3–5 days (I'll tell you exactly when). After that, just use the cream and don't scratch it!

q4.question: Can I come with my own design?
q4.answer: Of course! Bring a reference and we'll adapt it, or I can draw something similar in my style.

q5.question: What if I change my mind at the last minute?
q5.answer: No worries! We can reschedule, just please let me know at least 12 hours in advance.
